summary: Seasoned Information Technology professional with over 7 years of experience in various industries. Specializes in computer hardware/software installation, network administration, servers, Windows and Mac OS, IT support, QA testing, and troubleshooting with strong communication and leadership skills.
skills: Microsoft Applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Exchange, InfoPath, Lync, OneNote, Outlook, Project, Publisher, SharePoint, Visual Studio)
PC hardware and software installation, configuration, and troubleshooting
Remote Desktop and Help Desk Management
PHP, HTML, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL

experience.title: Engineering Systems Installer
experience.description: Installed, configured, upgraded, troubleshot and repaired software and hardware. Maintained hardware components; diagnosed connectivity issues; remote access into client computers. New hire and client training. Worked with Windows and Mac OS; managed printers; designed and deployed LANs/WANs; handled project tickets; supervised home automation, surveillance, and custom PC installations. On-call 24/7 support and 1st/2nd line help desk for multiple end-users.

experience.title: IT Technician/QA Tester
experience.description: Wrote progress and issue reports; authored procedures for data entry into databases; installed, configured, upgraded and repaired software/hardware; PC/Mac/laptop deployment; OS/Server (Windows 95/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1) and Mac OS/Linux; remote access; project ticket management; web development (HTML, HTML5, CSS3, PHP, MySQL, Java, JavaScript); team leadership.

experience.title: Installation/Service Technician
experience.description: Installed, programmed, serviced and repaired home security systems, home surveillance, and home automation; wire splicing (coaxial, CAT5/6, RJ12); customer and new hire training; timecard and inventory management; NSF/credit card/ACH processing; resolved inquiries; managed company vehicle.

education.degree: Bachelor of Electronics and Communications Engineering Technology

certifications: CompTIA Certification (A+, Cloud+, Network+, Security+, Linux+) - In Progress
